item.title: At least 19 dead after protests against Nepal social media ban
item.description: The protest was led by young people who oppose the ban in a country which relies heavily on social media platforms.

item.title: Six killed by Palestinian gunmen at Jerusalem bus stop
item.description: Israeli police say two gunmen were killed after the attack, which was one of the deadliest in the city in years.

item.title: 'Tariffs are costing my business $100,000 a month'
item.description: The gulf between Trump's rhetoric and the reality on the ground is starting to show.

item.title: French doctor goes on trial for poisoning 30 patients, 12 fatally
item.description: Frédéric Péchier, considered by colleagues to be a highly-talented practitioner, maintains there is no proof of any poisoning.

item.title: New Zealand dad shot dead by police after years on the run with children
item.description: Tom Phillips disappeared with his three children in 2021 after losing a custody battle.
